treatment-md.title: Leiopus (Carinopus) multipunctellus Wallin, Kvamme & Lin, 2012, sp. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: A review of the genera Leiopus Audinet-Serville, 1835 and Acanthocinus, Dejean, 1821 (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae, Lamiinae, Acanthocinini) in Asia, with descriptions of six new species of Leiopus from China
